info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:35PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Fairfield, central Middlesex, New Haven and eastern Putnam Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1135 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pawling to near Trumbull. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bridgeport around 1140 PM EDT. Trumbull and Brookfield around 1145 PM EDT. Stratford around 1150 PM EDT. Sherman around 1155 PM EDT. Shelton and Monroe around 1200 AM EDT. Seymour around 1205 AM EDT. Woodbridge around 1210 AM EDT. Naugatuck and Beacon Falls around 1220 AM EDT. Hamden and Prospect around 1225 AM EDT. Wallingford and Cheshire around 1230 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
